question: The Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine 2016 has been awarded to Yoshinori Ohsumi for the:
option1: discoveries concerning a novel therapy against Malaria
option3: discovery of the brain'??s internal GPS
option4: discoveries of machinery regulating vesicle traffic, a major transport system in our cells
explanation: The Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine 2016 has been awarded to Yoshinori Ohsumi for the discoveries of mechanisms for autophagy. Autophagy means “self-eating”. It is an intracellular degradation system that delivers cytoplasmic constituents to the lysosome and carries out the process by which our body cleans debris.
